text: | i e — Solve this question on: ssh cka2556 » Use Namespace project-tiger for the following. Create a DaemonSet named ds~ important with image httpd:2-alpine and labels id=ds-important and uuld=1842530b~5f59-4e10-923f—c0eo78e82462 - The Podss it creates should request 10 millicore cpu and 10 mebibyte memory. The Pods of that DaemonSet should run on all nodes, also controlplanes.
